title: How much of gross movie revenue goes to the producer? - Quora

response.answer_text: There is no fixed percentage that the 'distributor' gets of the final gross collections.If you want to know how much the producer gets, then mostly the producer gets money before the release of the movie only as distributors pay some fixed amount and buy the movie for their respective regions. However this transaction between producers and distributors can happen in many ways. On a sharing basis or on an outright basis.
